desc: Acadiana Pools offers pickup and delivery of pool care chemicals and compounds in the greater Lafayette, LA area!

layout.text: We offer FREE water testing upon pick-up or delivery

Acadiana Pools has all of the chemicals and supplies you need to keep your pool in top shape. You can order right here and pick up at our Breaux Bridge showroom, or get your order delivered to your door in the Greater Acadiana area. We deliver every Tuesday and Thursday! Parts and Accessories will be available soon.
